alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham County through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Ogallah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Graham County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
